headline: Did Seagate’s Q1 Margin Expansion and Earnings Beat Just Shift Seagate Technology Holdings' (STX) Investment Narrative?
summary: Earlier this year, Seagate Technology reported strong Q1 results, with higher gross and operating margins and earnings per share well above analyst expectations, supported by robust demand from data centers and other storage customers. The earnings release coincided with heavy buying interest flagged by a Power Inflow alert and a “Strong Buy” consensus from covering analysts, underscoring how operational improvements and sector demand are shaping market sentiment toward Seagate. With...
